thread.title: BRIEF-General Dynamics Mission Systems Awarded Contract For Continued Procurement Of U.S. Navy Digital Modular Radio

title: BRIEF-General Dynamics Mission Systems Awarded Contract For Continued Procurement Of U.S. Navy Digital Modular Radio

organizations.name: dynamics mission systems awarded contract for continued procurem
u.s. navy digital modular radio reuters staff

text: 41 PM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-General Dynamics Mission Systems Awarded Contract For Continued Procurement Of U.S. Navy Digital Modular Radio Reuters Staff Feb 16 (Reuters) - GENERAL DYNAMICS MISSION SYSTEMS : * GENERAL DYNAMICS MISSION SYSTEMS AWARDED CONTRACT FOR CONTINUED PROCUREMENT OF U.S. NAVY DIGITAL MODULAR RADIO * GENERAL DYNAMICS MISSION SYSTEMS - THE U.S. NAVY AWARDED CO A FIVE YEAR, $208 MILLION CONTRACT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
